ygData.subject: Re: How Can I Raise 2H Slashing?
ygData.msgSnippet: The higher the level of the creature that you attack....you skill will go up better.  It also depends on your intelligence.  You are a dark elf so it should go
ygData.messageBody:
The higher the level of the creature that you attack....you skill will go
up better. It also depends on your intelligence. You are a dark elf so
it should go up relatively quickly. Also if the skill is real low....like
i never trained in Taunt...now that I am fighting red and white /con's it
soars. Same I assume with most skills related to fighting. I would say
swing one handed against an even critter until you knock it down a good
ways...then switch to 2Hslashing and see if you can't work it up.

Korm
